name: Daily Diff Report

on:
  schedule:
    - cron: '0 21 * * *'  # 매일 오전 6시 KST (UTC+9)
  workflow_dispatch:      # 수동 실행 가능

jobs:
  diff-report:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - name: Checkout repository
        uses: actions/checkout@v4
        with:
          fetch-depth: 0  # 전체 커밋 히스토리 필요

      - name: Setup Python
        uses: actions/setup-python@v5
        with:
          python-version: '3.11'

      - name: Install dependencies
        run: |
          pip install GitPython

      - name: Generate daily diff report
        run: |
          python .github/scripts/daily_diff_report.py

      - name: Commit and push report
        run: |
          git config --global user.name "github-actions[bot]"
          git config --global user.email "github-actions[bot]@users.noreply.github.com"
          git add reports/
          git commit -m "Daily diff report $(date '+%Y-%m-%d')" || echo "No new report"
          git push
